snippet: Recent high school graduates who do not have bachelor’s degrees overwhelmingly believe they will need more education to have successful careers — but most do not expect to enroll anytime soon.
abstract: Recent high school graduates who do not have bachelor’s degrees overwhelmingly believe they will need more education to have successful careers — but most do not expect to enroll anytime soon.

headline.main: Don't Think College Is Worth It? Ask People Who Haven't Gone
